revised_title: Zoological and Crustacean Discoveries in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez
tldr: The article discusses the various zoological and crustacean species collected during the Transit of Venus Expeditions in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez in 1874-75. The author, Edward J. Miers, describes the collection of 189 specimens representing 35 species, mainly from the Fodophthalmia sub-tribe. The article provides detailed descriptions and classifications of the collected specimens, highlighting their geographical distribution and variations.
